title: Recessed Lighting - SS Apliances - Brand New Studio in Downtown LA
posting_body: ['Explore….Entertain……Experience…...E on Harvard Los Angeles CA luxury apartments.', 'Featuring studios and one bedroom apartments for lease, you can be sure to find the floor plan to suit your needs.', 'Our pet-friendly community offers the best location in Koreatown.', 'Be one of the firsts to embrace the enticing E on Harvard living experience.', 'Enjoy everything our prime location has to offer including our proximity to dining and shopping.', 'Call us today to schedule a tour of our apartments in Koreatown for rent!', '919 South Harvard Boulevard', 'Los Angeles, CA', '90006', 'Community Amenities:', '- Subterranean Parking', '- Elevator', '- Controlled Access', '- Non Smoking Community', '- Laundry On Site', 'Apartment Amenities:', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Balcony/Patio', '- Microwave', '- Central A/C and Heat', '- Refrigerator', '- Vinyl Plank Flooring', '- LATCH Front Door Systems', '- Recessed Lighting', '- Electronic Thermostat', '- Electric Stove', '- Dishwasher', '- Disposal', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cats and Dogs Welcome.', 'Additional Fees and Deposit May Apply.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', 'For more information Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information visit: <URL>', 'Square ft. is approximate.', 'Price and availability are subject to change.', 'Cities: DTLA, Hollywood, West Hollywood, South Park']
